meanings.definition: The act of turning over or rotating.
meanings.sent1: The rollover of the ball down the hill was slow and steady.
meanings.sent2: I watched the rollover of the log as it tumbled down the slope.
meanings.sent3: The rollover of the pancake in the pan made me hungry for breakfast.
meanings.sent4: The rollover of the clouds in the sky signaled an approaching storm.
meanings.sent5: The rollover of the dice determined the winner of the game.

meanings.definition: A feature in a software program that allows data to be carried over from one period to the next.
meanings.sent1: The rollover of the data saved me time when working on my project.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to use the rollover function to transfer information easily.
meanings.sent3: The rollover of the files between folders was seamless and efficient.
meanings.sent4: The rollover of the settings from the old version to the new one was flawless.
meanings.sent5: The rollover of the information ensured nothing was lost during the update.

meanings.definition: A type of vehicle accident in which a vehicle flips onto its side or roof.
meanings.sent1: The rollover of the car was a scary experience for the passengers.
meanings.sent2: The rollover of the truck caused a traffic jam on the highway.
meanings.sent3: The rollover of the bus in the movie was a thrilling action scene.
meanings.sent4: The rollover of the SUV was captured on the dashcam footage.
meanings.sent5: The rollover of the van was a reminder to drive safely on slippery roads.

meanings.definition: A type of financial transaction in which funds from one retirement account are transferred to another account without incurring tax penalties.
meanings.sent1: The rollover of the funds helped me consolidate my retirement savings.
meanings.sent2: I completed the rollover of my IRA to a new investment account.
meanings.sent3: The rollover of the pension funds was a smart financial move.
meanings.sent4: The rollover of the 401(k) was done smoothly by the financial advisor.
meanings.sent5: The rollover of the retirement funds allowed for better investment options.
